```{python}
def greedy(agent, m, i):
    x = agent.location[0]
    y = agent.location[1]
    v = agent.v
    a = m.cities[i][0]-x
    b = m.cities[i][1]-y
    b=b/abs(a)
    a=a/abs(a)
    f_min = 999999999999
    m_best = None
    for m in [(1,0),(-1,0),(0,1),(0,-1)]:
        v1 = v[0] + m[0]
        v2 = v[1] + m[1]
        f = (a-v1)*(a-v1)+(b-v2)*(b-v2)
        if f<f_min:
            f_min=f
            m_best=m
    return m_best
```
